+my_user_name=irfanhasan
+my_repo=retrofit
+git clone https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/$my_user_name/${my_repo}-cache.git

diff --git a/push.sh b/push.sh
new file mode 100644
index 000000000..041d4a28e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/push.sh
@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+#!/bin/sh
+
+my_user_name=irfanhasan
+my_repo=retrofit
+
+setup_git() {
+    git config --global user.email "travis@travis-ci.org"
+    git config --global user.name "Travis CI"
+    mkdir temp
+}
+
+commit_files() {
+    cd temp
+    git init
+    git remote add origin https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/$my_user_name/${my_repo}-cache.git 
+    git pull origin master
+    rm -r .ekstazi/
+    cp -R ../.ekstazi/ .ekstazi/
+    git add -f .ekstazi/*
+    git commit --message "Travis build: $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER"
+}
+
+upload_files() {
+    git push -u origin master
+}
+
+setup_git
+commit_files
+upload_files
